scheduler.name: scheduler
scheduler.label: FlowMatch Discrete Scheduler
scheduler.description: The FlowMatch Discrete Scheduler is a scheduler for the HunyuanVideo 1.5 model.

inputs.prompt: A rain-soaked neon city at night, glowing with electric blues and molten magentas. A lone figure walks through the street in slow motion as raindrops shatter into glittering particles around them. Reflections ripple across wet asphalt, holographic signage flickers in the mist, and passing vehicles streak into long light trails. The camera begins with a wide aerial glide, then descends into an intimate tracking shot at street level. Volumetric fog drifts through shafts of light, subtle lens flares bloom, and the atmosphere hums with quiet tension. Ultra-realistic textures, high dynamic range lighting, cinematic depth of field, smooth stabilized motion, dramatic pacing, film-grade color, epic yet moody tone.
